item.title: With New E.U. Loan, Ukraine Avoids Budget Crunch and Can Plan War Effort
item.description: The loan will cover two-thirds of the country’s financial needs for the next two years. It also bolsters Ukraine’s position in ongoing peace talks.

item.title: Brown University Shooting Suspect Found Dead, and Trump Eases Marijuana Restrictions
Trump’s New Marijuana Policy Offers an Opportunity
item.description: Marijuana has been tied to psychosis and other health problems. I still think it’s safer than alcohol.
